about_the_game:
On this deserted planet, overrun by monsters, heroes from different worlds emerge, initiating a sequence of battles. This is a divine experiment where survival is key.

Fantasy World, Heroes Rise


Athena the master, Steve the reliable, Diana the summoner, Zhao Yun the daring, and Kambo the panda traveler... A variety of professions, roles, and unique character talents ensure each experience is fresh. More roles await unlocking!

In a narrow encounter, no warrior escapes unscathed!


Upgrade skills in battle, customize your panel, enhance character stats with elite rewards, and change gameplay with BOSS rewards. Forge a path through enemy lines; every drop of blood strengthens the unyielding.

A hundred battles make a poem, an Unbending Legend


Face waves of monsters and a screen full of skills, embracing the joy of rogue-like and combat thrills! Unleash fiery blasts, summon giant swords from the sky, or control spears piercing through foes! Embrace battle, leave a legend; this is your unique journey!

Key Features

Quick Play: 20-30 minute sessions, unwind tense nerves anytime!
Ultra Satisfaction: Grass-cutting thrill, casual gaming delight!
Unique Talents: Distinct character talents for diverse combat joys!
Versatile Builds: Over 60 reward options, rogue-like + magic, endless possibilities!
Muscle Relax: Auto-aim skills with manual aim option!

Starting Tips

Choose runes before starting; they aid in defeating foes.
Collect experience, magic stones, and items dropped by monsters.
Unique rewards paired with apt skills are key to victory.
Luck is a factor, but persistence brings hope.

Closing Words

Battles will end, but the journey continues. Looking forward to sharing character backstories with you.
Thanks for following "Legend of the Unyielding". Join our official QQ group: 775423813 for updates, guides, and discussions.
